<RESUME_START>
TECHNICAL PROJECT MANAGER

SUMMARY

I am a PMP certified marketing, technical, and research project manager.
I currently work as a technical and research project manager at PMA Media Group.
I have led projects that include:
User Research/Testing and Product Planning UX Design and Graphics Design Web Development and Technical Software Creation Online Campaigns (Marketing Strategy and Asset Creation) SEO, Analytics, and other data points.
​I have a current Project Management Professional certificate and am working towards my Agile Project Management certificate and my IIBA Business Analyst certification.
I have not just lead projects, I am also experienced in production in the following areas:
Front end web-development UX and Graphics Design for Web sites SEO and Keyword Research Analytics for web, social, and email

SKILLS

Project Management (Including Agile Methodologies) 2.5 Years of WorkFront Experience (As well as JIRA, Trello, Slack, and others) ​Javascript, PhP, Html/Css, VBA, Multiple libraries (Jquery, Angular, etc.) Marketing Strategy for audience definition and strategy to tactics mapping
Microsoft Office, with high proficiency in Microsoft Excel Adobe Analytics Implementation and Measurement Proficiency  Capable of writing User Research scripts and Testing plans Conducting Focus groups, usability tests, surveys, and other testing methods.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Technical Product Owner

Location: North Carolina, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Quility is a leading technology-enabled, independent provider of life insurance products and financial wellness solutions. With thousands of agents operating in all 50 states and a corporate staff of over 150 strong, we forge long-lasting relationships with America's families and curate life insurance solutions to meet their evolving needs. Our advisors, partners, and team members come from a variety of backgrounds, but we all have one thing in common: We are dedicated to helping our clients protect what matters most.

 Description  :  Quility is seeking a Technical Product Owner with expertise in data development and product management. This role involves prioritizing data product features, managing the backlog, aligning them with business goals, developing detailed roadmaps and requirements, and defining user stories with acceptance criteria. The ideal candidate will be the key interface between engineering, business requirement analysts, and stakeholders, utilizing their technical knowledge to bridge product vision with technical execution. They will have experience with real-time data interfacing (Confluent Kafka, APIM APIs), ETL/ELT pipeline development (Databricks, Azure Data Factory, Pentaho), and managing an enterprise data warehouse in Snowflake. This role is crucial for integrating data to support business decisions and requires a blend of technical expertise and strategic product management skills.

Responsibilities

 Own the product vision and roadmap for centralized databases, ensuring robust, real-time data exchange between applications through efficient event management.  Lead the strategy and execution for developing and maintaining ETL/ELT pipelines, optimizing data flow and integration across the organization.  Oversee the enterprise data warehouse architecture in Snowflake, ensuring it supports business requirements by integrating data from diverse sources, including OLTP systems and application databases.  Develop comprehensive user stories, acceptance criteria, and manage the product backlog to prioritize features effectively.  Collaborate closely with the development team to ensure technical projects are delivered efficiently and align with business goals.  Conduct User Acceptance Testing to validate product features and functionality before release.  Serve as a key liaison between technical teams and business stakeholders, translating complex data concepts into understandable business terms.  Promote agile methodologies and scrum practices within the team, facilitating agile ceremonies and ensuring alignment with agile best practices. 

Qualifications

 Bachelor's degree in computer science, Data Science, Information Technology, or a related field.  5+ years of experience in data-related development roles, with a strong background in database management, data integration, and warehousing solutions.  3+ years of experience working in the agile framework as a product manager, product Owner or engineering manager, or similar role  Expertise with databases & SQL, data streaming services like Confluent Kafka or similar APIs, data integration services like Databricks, and Azure Data Factory, and data warehouse solutions like Snowflake, and Jira.  Proven ability to craft detailed user stories, manage product backlogs, and define epics that align with business objectives.  Experience leading User Acceptance Testing and working closely with development teams in an agile environment.  Strong communication skills, with the capability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.  Demonstrated experience in Agile methodologies and working with scrum teams is essential.  Desired Skills  Certification in Agile Product Ownership or Scrum Master.  Experience in data analytics and insights generation.  Familiarity with cloud computing platforms, preferably Azure. 

Desired Skills

 Certification in Agile Product Ownership or Scrum Master.  Experience in data analytics and integration.  Familiarity with cloud computing platforms, preferably Azure.

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
